text: puokke ban niyeay tha tae anak ban mokadl puok yeung daembi aoy puok yeung korp sakkar champoh a l laoh temuoyokt ning aoy yeung baohbngchaol nouv avei del chidaunchitea robsa puok yeung ban korp sakkar ryy? dau che neah chaur anak neamk aoy puok yeung nouv avei( tearounakamm) del anak ban dasatuen promean puok yeung meul brasenbae anak sthet knongchamnaom anak sachch men noh
